name: io.github.isakskogstad/sverigesradio
title: Sveriges Radio MCP Server
description: MCP server for Sveriges Radio's Open API - access Swedish radio programs, podcasts, live streams, playlists, news and traffic information.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_AUTH_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Optional Bearer token for authentication (leave empty for public access)

environmentVariables.name: SR_API_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Timeout for SR API requests in milliseconds (default: 8000)

environmentVariables.name: ALLOWED_ORIGINS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins (default: * for all)

environmentVariables.name: RATE_LIMIT_REQUESTS
environmentVariables.description: Max requests per minute per IP (default: 60)

tools.name: list_channels
tools.description: List all Sveriges Radio channels (P1-P4, local stations)

tools.name: get_channel_rightnow
tools.description: Get what's playing right now on a specific channel

tools.name: search_programs
tools.description: Search for radio programs with relevance ranking

tools.name: get_program
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific program

tools.name: list_program_categories
tools.description: List all 15 program categories

tools.name: list_episodes
tools.description: List episodes for a program

tools.name: search_episodes
tools.description: Full-text search in episodes

tools.name: get_episode
tools.description: Get specific episode with audio files

tools.name: get_episodes_batch
tools.description: Fetch multiple episodes at once

tools.name: get_latest_episode
tools.description: Get the latest episode for a program

tools.name: get_channel_schedule
tools.description: Get schedule for a channel and date

tools.name: get_program_broadcasts
tools.description: Get upcoming broadcasts for a program

tools.name: get_all_rightnow
tools.description: Get what's playing on ALL channels right now

tools.name: get_playlist_rightnow
tools.description: Get current song (previous, current, next) with full metadata

tools.name: get_channel_playlist
tools.description: Get song history for a channel in time range

tools.name: get_program_playlist
tools.description: Get song history for a program in time range

tools.name: get_episode_playlist
tools.description: Get complete playlist for an episode

tools.name: list_news_programs
tools.description: List all news programs

tools.name: get_latest_news_episodes
tools.description: Get latest news broadcasts

tools.name: get_traffic_messages
tools.description: Get traffic messages by area

tools.name: get_traffic_areas
tools.description: Get traffic areas (with GPS lookup)

tools.name: search_all
tools.description: Global search across programs, episodes, and channels

tools.name: get_recently_published
tools.description: Get recently published content

tools.name: get_top_stories
tools.description: Get featured content from SR

tools.name: list_extra_broadcasts
tools.description: List extra broadcasts (sports, special events)

tools.name: get_episode_group
tools.description: Get a collection of episodes

resources.name: API Information
resources.description: API capabilities, versions, rate limits, caching info
